description:
single-stack <info>Rubicon Industries</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color>, colored black with a sculpted metal finish.
RI's logo is printed on the side of the magazine and will probably only work with RI's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

single-stack 22 ria .44 <info>Rubicon Industries</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color>, colored black with a sculpted metal finish, it has been <color_yellow>welded</color> with some extra metal to be longer, the welding seems to be of <bad>low quality</bad>.
RI's logo is printed on the side of the magazine but is covered from the welding line and will probably only work with RI's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

single-stack 22 ria .44 <info>Rubicon Industries</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color>, colored black with a sculpted metal finish, it has been <color_yellow>welded</color> with some extra metal to be longer, the welding seems to be of <good>good quality</good>.
RI's logo is printed on the side of the magazine, even if it's covered from the welding line the logo has been redrawn on top of it for aesthetics purposes and will probably only work with RI's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
